title: Skout
description: FlagFootball scout plays and relevant information

team.description: The name of the scouted team.

opponent.description: The name of the team the scouted team was playing against.

date.description: The date the game was played.

score.description: The final score of the game.

items.description: Scouted team score first, then opponent score.
Object storing information about the play.

routes.description: The routes the players were running in the receiver order ACBD.

formation.description: The alignment/formation of the receivers. Empty means spread.

down.description: The down the play was run in. 5 corresponds to PAT.

strongside.description: The side where more receivers aligned.

clipnumber.description: Number of the video clip the play was scouted from.
